"Intensive Training in the Lost Sea!":
"Wah? I saw you again, yeah!
<%me>! Since you're here, we might as well take
this opportunity to go to
the desert together! Although the desert is a
different harsh environment from that of the
cauldron, I think that the poor foothold in
that area is good training! Aim for an S Rank
at Very Hard or higher!
*Clear at S-Rank for Very Hard Difficulty and
above as a Samurai, travelling with Azanami only."

"あれ？　また会っちゃったね！
ねえ<%me>！
せっかく会えたし一緒に砂漠へ行こうよ！
砂漠って火山洞窟とはまた違った厳しい
エリアだけど、あそこの足場の悪さとか
結構いい訓練になると思うんだよねー。
ベリーハード以上をＳランククリア！
目指してがんばってみよー！
※アザナミのみ同行、ブレイバー限定
ベリーハード以上、Ｓランククリア"
